content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Please take it and continue watering the Luca Arbor.

{A笑哈哈}Congratulations, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Your Crop Harvest Fair went down a treat! After admiring all those fine crops, our Neighbors are eager to try their hands at farming — the whole planet is buzzing with life!
